title: He Loves Me But He Dates Other Women
itunes:title: He Loves Me But He Dates Other Women
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 27 year old single mother of two beautiful girls and I’m in the US Army. I’ve been casually dating a gentleman for 2 years now. We are not exclusive, but he’s met my kids and my family and our bond is incredible. I have never been in love like this and I want more than he’s willing to offer. He’s the one that doesn’t want to be in a monogamous relationship but he makes a way to see me once a week, even though we live over 300 miles away from one another.........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 27 year old single mother of two beautiful girls and I’m in the US Army. I’ve been casually dating a gentleman for 2 years now. We are not exclusive, but he’s met my kids and my family and our bond is incredible. I have never been in love like this and I want more than he’s willing to offer. He’s the one that doesn’t want to be in a monogamous relationship but he makes a way to see me once a week, even though we live over 300 miles away from one another.........
